entry.fl: noun plural but singular in construction

def.dt: :previously unknown information I've got news for you
:something having a specified influence or effect the rain was good news for lawns and gardens Garrison Keillor the virus was bad news
:material reported in a newspaper or news periodical or on a newscast
:an organization that supplies news to subscribing newspapers, periodicals, and newscasters

entry.fl: noun plural but singular in construction

def.dt: :one that is troublesome, unwelcome, or dangerous stay away from him, he's bad news
city & port SE Virginia on James River & Hampton Roads pop 180,150
